entry.title: $1900 // DIRECT (NO BROKER) - DUPLEX PENTHOUSE
entry.content:
Unique fully furnished 5BR/3BA sun drenched Duplex Chelsea Penthouse. We are seeking a roommate who is sociable, professional, clean, and polite aged 25 to 32. The apartment features a private roof terrace, a greenhouse, and three balconies. Less than two minute walk to A-C-E and 1-2-3 subway lines. We are looking for someone who is EXCITED about living in a communal setting in downtown Manhattan.

Bed/Bath:
5BR/3BA- you will be sharing a bathroom with ONE other person who is clean, polite, and friendly.

Financials:
$3,000 FULLY REFUNDABLE Security Deposit Due at Signing
$1,900/Mo (12 months) + Utilities $200-300 - no more than $2,200 all in
Verification of Income Required

Availability:
Flexible- move in date is not set in stone. We can work with your date and pro-rate to accommodate.

IN YOUR REPLY:
If interested please reply. Include a brief description of yourself, where you're from, what you do for work, where you went to school, what your hobbies are, and we'll go from there. We're looking forward to meeting our new roommate!
